short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our app rounds up every price you see online to save you from psychological tricks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online stores trick your lizard brain by round prices down. We help you evaluate costs without their tricks by automatically rounding prices up to the next whole number. 

So the "cheaper" $34.99 becomes a flat $35.00, better reflecting it's true cost. 

Note: Not compatible with all pricing configurations and thus will not work on all sites.
